africa is South Africa 's newest and most exciting tech blog , covering everything from the top end of government IT investment and spending down to maker culture , hackspaces and - well , generally - fun .

We cover far more of the latter than the former , in fact , and aim to make this the number one community for genuinely interesting stuff that 's coming from South Africa and the rest of the continent .
We love games , 3 D printers , start - ups and innovative apps that will save the world .
